text: Once Gunnar’s PR is merged and CI protects against this, <@U7THT3TM3>, would you be willing to write up a Discourse post?

elements.text: Once Gunnar’s PR is merged and CI protects against this,
, would you be willing to write up a Discourse post?

text:
Important points are:
- manifest are always safe to instantiate
- any time you resolve or upgrade is when the attack can happen
- if the attacker doesn’t know UUIDs they can’t attack, so Julia is somewhat safer than other languages, but not that safe
